component.name: spotify
component.summary: A Open Source installer for spotify a proprietary peer-to-peer music streaming service

description.p: Listen to the right music, wherever you are. With Spotify, you have access to a world of music. You can listen to artists and albums, or create your own playlist of your favorite songs. Want to discover new music? Choose a ready-made playlist that suits your mood or get personalized recommendations. Listen for free; play any artist, album, or playlist on shuffle mode.
